[[Martin Šec]] | editing = [[Vasilis Skalenakis]] | distributor = | released = {{film date|2012|11|1}} | runtime = 107 minutes | country = Czech Republic | language = Czech | budget = }} '''''7 dní hříchů''''' (English: 7 days of sins) is a 2012 [[Czech language|Czech]] [[Drama film|historical drama film]] directed by [[Jiří Chlumský]]. * [[Vica Kerekes]] as Agnes * [[Ondřej Vetchý]] as Jan Olšan * [[Jiří Schmitzer]] as Ditrich * [[Anna Šišková]] as Helga * [[Norbert Lichý]] as Dohnal * [[Fedor Bondarchuk]] as Uvarov * [[Jarek Hylebrant]] as Jürgen Schreier * [[Igor Bareš]] as Přikryl * [[Atilla Mokos]] as Brachtl * [[Kostas Zerdaloglu]] as Bozděch == External links == * [http://film7dnihrichu.cz/en/ Official film website] *{{Imdb title|id=2375922|title=7 dní hříchů}} * ''[http://www.csfd.cz/film/302588-7-dni-hrichu/ 7 dní hříchů]'' at CSFD.cz {{cs icon}} * ''[http://www.kinobox.cz/film/263355-7-dni-hrichu 7 dní hříchů]'' at cfn.cz {{cs icon}} {{DEFAULTSORT:7 dni hrichu}} [[Category:2012 films]] [[Category:Czech films]] [[Category:Czech-language films]] [[Category:2010s drama films]] [[Category:Czech action films]] {{CzechRepublic-film-stub}}
